issue.title: Dashboard with stats
issue.body:
### Background information
- [x] Reporting an issue of an unmodified OSPOS installation
- [x] Checked [open and closed issues](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aissue) and no similar issue was already reported (please make sure you searched!)
- [x] Read [README](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/blob/master/README.md), [WHATS_NEW](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/blob/master/WHATS_NEW.txt), [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/blob/master/INSTALL.md) and [UPGRADE](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/blob/master/UPGRADE.txt)
- [x] Read the [FAQ](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos#faq) for any known install and/or upgrade gotchas (in specific PHP extensions installed)
- [x] Read the [wiki](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/wiki)
- [x] Executed any database upgrade scripts if an upgrade pre 3.0.0 (e.g. database/2.4_to_3.0.sql)
- [x] Aware the installation code is in [bintray](https://bintray.com/jekkos/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/view/files?sort=updated&order=asc#files) (see README), and [GitHub master](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/tree/master) is for [developers only](https://github.com/opensourcepos/opensourcepos/wiki/Development-setup) and therefore not complete nor stable

### Installation information

- OSPOS version is: 3.3.2
- OSPOS git commit hash is: bb309c
- PHP version is: 7.4.3
- MySQL or MariaDB version is: 8.0.22
- OS and version is: Linux Mint 20
- WebServer is: Apache
- Selected language is: 
- (If applicable) Docker installation: 
- (If applicable) Installation package for the LAMP/LEMP stack is: LAMP

### New Feature

Have anybody thought/planned/done something about create a dashboard instead of showing icons on the home page?

For example:

![this one](https://www.clicdata.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/example-dashboard-014-1-931x1024.png)

issue.title: logout
issue.body: hi, is there any body can help me about logout issue. i uploaded ospos files as sub-domain -> ospos.mysite.com and everything working perfectly except logout, when i click logout its goes to home page why??? its suppose to go to login page but not!

comment.body:
This happened to me too.

I'm using OsPOS 3.3.8-ffe492.

One thing I've found is that sometimes the browser cache can mess around with navigation while logged in, have you tried clearing the cache? If you're using a chrome based browser: Inspect element->right click on the reload button->select: Empty cache and hard reload--that did it for me, it does happen a few times a week though. Just keep "logging out", it will log you out eventually.

The cache issue has been discussed before, I just can't find the link to it now, sorry. It might have been a reference to something else, but it had to do with the browser cache and having to clear it.

issue.title: Discount Amount
issue.body:
When discount amount is more than the retail price it is calculated as negative making total cost in negative.

But when discount is calculated in percentage everything seem ok
### Background information

issue.title: ci4-upgrade   -     .htaccess and POST   -  GET
issue.body:
Good evening,
I carefully read the #steveIrland thread
  CI4: Form is being redirected from POST (which is how it is generated) to a GET #3721

and I must admit that I didn't understand everything...
indeed some methods like getIndex() work if the URL ends with "index" but for other cases it doesn't work???
Error in source links: Error: request failed with status 404
Resource URL: http://localhost/ci4_opensourceospos_latest/public/resources/js/html2canvas-e1d3a8d7cd.js
Source link URL: html2canvas.js.map

XHRGET
http://localhost/ci4_opensourceospos_latest/public/items/checkNumeric?cost_price=0.00
[HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found 18ms]

XHRGET
http://localhost/ci4_opensourceospos_latest/public/items/checkNumeric?unit_price=0.00
[HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found 26ms]

XHRGET
http://localhost/ci4_opensourceospos_latest/public/items/checkNumeric?quantity_1=0
[HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found 18ms]

XHRGET
http://localhost/ci4_opensourceospos_latest/public/items/checkNumeric?receiving_quantity=1
[HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found 16ms]

XHRGET
http://localhost/ci4_opensourceospos_latest/public/items/checkNumeric?reorder_level=1
I don't see where the problem comes from....
Thanks for your help

forkee.name: opensourcepos
forkee.description: Open Source Point of Sale is a web based point of sale application written in PHP using CodeIgniter framework. It uses MySQL as the data back end and has a Bootstrap 3 based user interface.

issue.title: Clean git history for ci4-upgrade branch
issue.body:
I'm about to cleanup the feature branch history, found a reference for this job here

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34127596/git-squash-sequential-commits-by-an-author-to-compress-history?rq=3

For convenience I'll create a new branch from ci4-upgrade where we can switch to.

comment.body:
this git feature should help a bit the rebase: https://git-scm.com/docs/git-rerere
was not aware of it, but I think it can take away having to revisit the merge conflcts during the rebase as those are not considered.

commits.message:
CI4: Bugfix test sanity of config item

Add a !empty test when dereferencing mailchimp_api_key and mailchimp_list_id from the config array.

commits.message:
CI4: Bugfix to correct two config issues

Adds 'payment_message' to the app_config table and corrects a typo in Views/login.php where 'Login.form' should have been 'login_form'.

pull_request.title: CI4: Bugfix to correct two config issues
pull_request.body: Adds 'payment_message' to the app_config table and corrects a typo in Views/login.php where 'Login.form' should have been 'login_form'.
